subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Arthur Ashe’s widow, Jeanne Moutoussamy-Ashe, used the anniversary of Ashe’s death to unveil a fantastic, interactive Web site designed to commemorate her husband’s spirit.
snippet: Arthur Ashe’s widow, Jeanne Moutoussamy-Ashe, used the anniversary of Ashe’s death to unveil a fantastic, interactive Web site designed to commemorate her husband’s spirit.
